title: Drawing, "Partial View of Guaranda, Ecuador", June 3, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457e
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at various locations:  trees / mustard / corn / yerba / colors; and at lower right: Guaranda.
description: Horizontal view of a part of the town of Guaranda seen against the mountain background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Partial View of Guaranda, Ecuador", June 3, 1857.
June 3, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-190.
